# Ramadan Sahar Food Guide - Chennai

## Project Overview
A React-based web application that helps the Muslim community in Chennai find Sahar/Sehri food locations during Ramadan. The platform lists masjids, hotels, restaurants, and organizations offering free or paid Sahar meals.

## Tech Stack
- **Framework**: React with Vite
- **Routing**: React Router DOM
- **Styling**: CSS (custom styles in src/styles/)
- **Animations**: Framer Motion
- **Icons**: React Icons (Font Awesome)
- **Deployment**: Netlify
- **Forms**: HubSpot Forms API integration

## Key Features

### 1. Location Listings (App.jsx)
- Displays all Sahar food locations from `data.js`
- Search functionality by name, area, or description
- Filter by type (Free/Paid) and location
- Sort by location or type
- Favorites system (localStorage)
- Grid/List view toggle
- Google Maps integration for directions
- Copy contact information

### 2. Join as Provider Form (JoinAsProvider.jsx)
- Vendor registration form
- Fields:
  - Vendor Name (required)
  - Type: Free/Paid (required, radio buttons)
  - Area Name (required)
  - Full Address (required, textarea)
  - Vendor Contact Number (required)
  - Vendor Contact Name (required)
  - Time (optional)
  - Email (optional, auto-generates {vendorname}@novmail.com if not provided)
- Submits to HubSpot Forms API
- Portal ID: 245234841
- Form ID: 6ce3f8f6-e22c-464d-9511-53efa381d7fa

### 3. HelloBar Component
- Green gradient announcement bar
- Sticky at top (z-index: 999)
- Message: "ðŸŒ™Hello Muslim Community! Organizing Sehri in Chennai? Register your masjid or area with us. May Allah reward you for your service."
- Links to /join-provider
- Dismissible with close button

### 4. Contact Form (ContactUs.jsx)
- HubSpot integration
- Portal ID: 245234841
- Form ID: 47bad74a-28d8-499d-8ec1-2b1e3ad037dc

## Data Structure (data.js)
Each location object contains:
```javascript
{
  location: "Area name",
  name: "Vendor/Masjid name",
  type: "Free" | "Paid",
  category: "Masjid" | "Hotel" | "Restaurant" | "Organization" | "Home Delivery",
  address: "Full address",
  time: "Operating hours or 'Time not available'",
  contact: "Contact person â€“ phone number or '-'",
  description: "Additional info"
}
```
